00074 #ifndef __STTYPES_H
00075 #define __STTYPES_H
00076 
00077 
00082 //#define __stDEBUG__
00083 
00087 #define __stVIEW__
00088 
00089 // Basic integer types
00090 #if defined(__GNUC__)
00091    // GNU C
00096    typedef unsigned short stWord;
00097 
00102    typedef unsigned long stDWord;
00103 
00108    typedef unsigned long long stQWord;
00109 #elif defined(__BORLANDC__)
00110    // Borland C
00111 
00116    typedef  unsigned __int16 stWord;
00117 
00122    typedef unsigned __int32 stDWord;
00123 
00128    typedef unsigned __int64 stQWord;
00129 #elif defined(_MSC_VER)
00130    // MS Visual C++
00135    typedef  unsigned __int16 stWord;
00136 
00141    typedef unsigned __int32 stDWord;
00142 
00147    typedef unsigned __int64 stQWord;
00148 #else
00149    // Default
00154    typedef unsigned short stWord;
00155 
00160    typedef unsigned long stDWord;
00161 
00167    typedef unsigned long stQWord;
00168    
00169    #pragma message "stQWord is not properly defined."
00170 #endif // defined
00171 
00172 
00177 typedef unsigned char stByte;
00178 
00184 typedef stDWord stPageID;
00185 
00191 typedef stDWord stSize;
00192 
00198 typedef double stDistance;
00199 
00205 typedef stDWord stCount;
00206 
00212 typedef stWord stNodeType;
00213 
00214 #endif //__STTYPES_H
